function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective air disinfection","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infections and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and calibration of air disinfection devices","Technologies":"High-efficiency filters, enclosed GUV, cold plasma","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building managers, facility operators"},{"Description":"Inadequate air changes per hour (ACH)","Impact":"Low protection against most airborne infections","Mitigation":"Use of larger, high-output machines to achieve 6 to 12 ACH","Technologies":"Room air cleaners with higher capacity","People":"Occupants of large volume rooms","Owner":"Facility operators, building managers"},{"Description":"Risk of recapture, drafts, and noise","Impact":"Limits the practical utility of room air cleaners in many settings","Mitigation":"Selection of better-designed room air cleaners to minimize recapture, drafts, and noise","Technologies":"Specially designed room air cleaners","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building managers, facility operators"}]}
